title: IIFCL expects to disburse Rs 50,000 crore in the next financial year - Business Standard
content: IIFCL expects to disburse Rs 50,000 crore in the next financial year  Business Standard
description: Outstanding advances stood at Rs 37,688 crore at the end of September 2021. They rose from Rs 33,637 crore in March 2020 and Rs 36,647 crore in March 2021, according to ICRA.
